page.title: 08Childrens Games
page.content: {Games children play The games P.1 girls play at are mainly houses,hop-skotch,balls,skipping ropes,riding their bikes,wonder woman hiding seek,tig and perfection. The most popular game is houses for little girls. Inside school P1+2 like to play with plastercine,races,stairs,beds, balls,tig,hiding-seek,houses and jigsaws.The most popular game the boys play outside school was riding bikes.The most popular game for the girls in P.3+4 in school was balls,hide+seek, skipping ropes,beds, stairs + houses.The boys in P.3+4 enjoy playing football, British bull dogs and goosies. The girls in P.3+4 play these games out of school: roller skates, chases, on their bikes, hop-skotch,skipping ropes,hide+seek, goosies, ballidores.The games boys like to play outside school are{-contd
